we.should.database

Class WSdb

  • java.lang.Object
    • we.should.database.WSdb

  • public class WSdb
extends java.lang.Object
    WeShould Database class - contains database methods used in the WeShould Android Application
    NOTE: Most methods are sending Log verbose output. Running LogCat while executing displays information. See DBexamples.txt for examples on how to call the methods and parse results.
    Author:
    Troy Schuring - UW CSE403 SP12

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public boolean open()
        Open database for writing
        Returns:
        true if db is open and writable, false otherwise
        Throws:
        ex - caught SQLiteException if failure to open writable database, will open readable if fails

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Check if the database is currently open
        Returns:
        true if open, false otherwise

      • close

        public void close()
        Close open database object

      • insertItem

        public long insertItem(java.lang.String name,
              int categoryId,
              java.lang.String data)
        Insert an Item into the database
        Parameters:
        name - of Item being entered
        categoryId - unique id of Item's category
        mappable - boolean true if item can be mapped, false otherwise
        data - json code holding item schema & data
        Returns:
        row ID of the newly inserted row, or -1 if an error occurred
        Throws:
        ex - caught SQLiteException if insert fails

      • insertCategory

        public long insertCategory(java.lang.String name,
                  int colorID,
                  java.lang.String schema)
        Insert a category into the database
        Parameters:
        name - of category being entered
        color - key id of the color associated with this Category
        schema - string to identify category schema
        Returns:
        row ID of the newly inserted row, or -1 if an error occurred
        Throws:
        ex - caught SQLiteException if insert fails
        SQLConstraintException

      • insertColor

        public long insertColor(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String rgb,
               java.lang.String drawable)
        insert a color
        Parameters:
        name - string name of color
        rgb - 6-digit hexidecimal rgb value
        drawable - link to map pin with this color
        Returns:
        row ID of the newly inserted color, or -1 if an error occurred

      • insertTag

        public long insertTag(java.lang.String name)
        Insert a Tag into the database
        Parameters:
        name - of Tag
        Returns:
        row ID of the newly inserted tag, or -1 if an error occurred
        Throws:
        ex - caught SQLiteException if insert fails

      • insertItem_Tag

                  int tagID)
        Insert an item-tag relationship into the database- "Tag an item"
        Parameters:
        itemID - key id of item to be tagged
        tagID - key id of tag to be placed on item
        Returns:
        row ID of newly inserted row, or -1 if an error occurred
        Throws:
        ex - caught SQLiteException if insert fails

      • getAllItems

        public Cursor getAllItems()
        Get the list of all items ordered by name
        Returns:
        cursor to list of all items ordered by id (default) SQL query select * from item

      • getItem

        public Cursor getItem(int itemId)
        Get the item with id=itemId
        Returns:
        cursor to the item SQL query select * from item where id=[given id]

      • getAllCategories

        public Cursor getAllCategories()
        Get the list of all categories ordered by id
        Returns:
        cursor to list of all categories ordered by id (default) SQL query select * from category

      • getCategory

        public Cursor getCategory(int catId)
        Get the category with id=catId
        Parameters:
        catId - key id of the category you want to return
        Returns:
        cursor to single category SQL query select * from category where id=[given id]

      • getAllTags

        public Cursor getAllTags()
        Get the list of all tags ordered by id
        Returns:
        cursor to ordered list of tags SQL query select * from tag

      • getTag

        public Cursor getTag(int tagId)
        Get the tag with id=tagId
        Returns:
        cursor to the tag SQL query select * from tag where tagid=[given id]

      • getItemsOfTag

        public Cursor getItemsOfTag(int tagId)
        Get every item with tag tagId
        Parameters:
        tagId - key id of the tag of the items to return
        Returns:
        cursor to list of all item id# with the given tag SQL query select * from item_tag, item where item_tag.tag_id=tagId and item_tag.item_id = item.id

      • getTagsOfItem

        public Cursor getTagsOfItem(int itemId)
        Get every tag of of an item with given itemId
        Parameters:
        itemId - id of the item to get all tags of
        Returns:
        cursor to list of all tag id# of the given item SQL query select * from item_tag, tag where item_tag.item_id=itemId and item_tag.tag_id= tag.id

      • getItemsOfCategory

        public Cursor getItemsOfCategory(int catId)
        get all items of the category with id=catId
        Parameters:
        catId - id of the category
        Returns:
        cursor to all items in this category select * from item where cat_id=[given id]

      • getAllColors

        public Cursor getAllColors()
        get a list of all colors ordered by id
        Returns:
        Cursor to list of all colors

        Parameters:
        sql - the SQL query
        selection - may include ?s in where clause which will be replaced by vlaues from selection[]

        tagId - key id of tag

                 int colorID,
                 java.lang.String schema)
        update all category fields other than key id to given values
        Parameters:
        catID - id of category to update
        name - string name of category
        colorID - id of new color of category
        schema - JSON string defining category fields
        Returns:
        number of rows updated (0 if failed, 1 if success)

        itemID - id of item to update
        newName - new name of item
        catId - id of category item belongs to
        data - string of JSON field data
        Returns:
        number of rows updated (0 if failed, 1 if success)

        public boolean deleteItem(int itemId)
        Deletes an item and item-tag associations
        Parameters:
        itemId - id of item to be deleted
        Returns:
        true on successful deletion, false if transaction conflicts with referential integrity and transaction rolled back

      • deleteCategory

        public boolean deleteCategory(int catId)
        Deletes a Category. Requires no items to have this category id
        Parameters:
        catId - id of the category to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if category deleted, false otherwise

        Returns:
        true if tag deleted, false otherwise
